NAME.meaning: Ridge - One who walks on mountaintops
NAME.origin: Named for Major Ridge, Cherokee leader

TAGLINES: Walking the High Ground of Connection
identity.MISSION:
Ganuda returns digital sovereignty to all people through
                Cherokee wisdom and quantum technology. Like Major Ridge
                who walked between worlds, Ganuda bridges ancient wisdom
                and modern innovation, giving users true choice over their
                digital lives.

VISUAL_IDENTITY.typography: Clean modern with Cherokee syllabary option

GANUDA_CLOUD.name: Ganuda Cloud
GANUDA_CLOUD.vision: AI that belongs to everyone and no one

GANUDA_PROTOCOL.name: The Ganuda Protocol
GANUDA_PROTOCOL.goal: Become the HTTP of swarm intelligence

stories.ORIGIN_STORY:
Major Ridge walked the mountaintops to see clearly,
                to find the best path for his people. He lived between
                two worlds, trying to preserve Cherokee sovereignty.
                
                Ganuda continues his journey in the digital realm.
                Where Ridge sought political sovereignty, Ganuda delivers
                digital sovereignty. No more impossible choices - 
                Two Wolves lets users choose their own path.
stories.ELEVATOR_PITCH:
"Ganuda is Cherokee-built technology that finds the
                strongest signals - for your phone, your WiFi, your life.
                Like ridges are the high ground between valleys,
                Ganuda finds the optimal path through digital chaos.
                You choose privacy or performance. You own your data.
                Walking the mountaintops of connection."
stories.TECHNICAL_STORY:
Using quantum crawdad swarm intelligence and Cherokee
                wisdom of Seven Generations thinking, Ganuda creates
                pheromone trails that help all devices find better
                connections while preserving privacy through our
                Two Wolves architecture.
stories.CULTURAL_STORY:
First Nations have always been innovative - from
                sustainable agriculture to democratic governance.
                Ganuda represents Indigenous innovation in the digital
                age, using ancestral wisdom to solve modern problems.
                This is Cherokee technology for all people.
stories.USER_STORY:
"My phone always struggled at concerts. Then I got
                Ganuda. It found signal ridges I didn't know existed.
                And I control whether my data helps others or stays
                private. It's technology that respects me."

PHASE_3_ALLIES.message: True digital sovereignty with Two Wolves

PHASE_4_MAINSTREAM.message: Find your ridge - better signal, true choice

ACKNOWLEDGMENTS: Honor Major Ridge with respect and complexity
Credit Cherokee wisdom in all materials
Share profits with Cherokee Nation programs
DECISION_MAKING: Seven Generations thinking for all features
